title: Substitution in Function
text: How can we substitute $$16$$ into the equation? We can replace $$x$$ with $$16$$ in the given function expression.

title: Taking the Fourth Root.
text: What is $$\sqrt[4]{81}$$, what can be multiplied by itself $$4$$ times to get 81? $$3^4=81$$, so $$\sqrt[4]{81}=3=f(16)$$.
